title: Companions
description:
Something is wrong with the Universe, and you know exactly what it is. We used to live in a candy-colored age, full of wonder and danger in equal measure. Standing over the balanced Universe were its mighty guardians, the Time Ladies. A great war destroyed all but one of them. She was the Earth's defender, protecting it time and again from alien threats. She was a god humbled by death. She was your friend. She was the Doctor.

And then she died.

Now the Doctor's enemies gather and plot, scheming to claim the Universe for themselves. Only you, her stalwart and learned companions, stand against the encroaching darkness. It's a good thing she trained you so well, isn't it?
